trans-unit.source: Enables comparisons between an isolated store and an application domain and assembly's evidence.
trans-unit.target: 啟用隔離的存放區與應用程式定義域和組件的辨識項之間的比較。

trans-unit.source: Isolated storage uses evidence about an assembly in order to identify it and provide it with a unique file storage location.
trans-unit.target: 隔離儲存區會使用有關以識別並提供唯一的檔案儲存位置的組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: When an assembly requests a store, its evidence (as presented by the host that loaded it) is processed and compared with the evidence used to create the existing stores.
trans-unit.target: 當組件要求的存放區時，它的辨識項 （如上所示的主應用程式在載入） 處理，而且相較於用來建立現有的存放區的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: This determines if you need to create a new store or if one already exists for the assembly in question.
trans-unit.target: 這會決定如果您需要建立新的存放區，或如果已經有組件有問題。

trans-unit.source: Due to the comparison technique used, pieces of evidence that are functionally equivalent might not result in a true comparison if the serialized forms are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的比較技巧，因為的辨識項的功能相當的片段可能會導致，則為 true 的比較如果序列化的格式不完全相同。

trans-unit.source: When implementing custom evidence, consider whether this is the case for your evidence class and, if so, implement INormalizeForIsolatedStorage.
trans-unit.target: 實作自訂的辨識項，請考慮是否辨識項類別的情況時，如果是這樣，實作 INormalizeForIsolatedStorage。

trans-unit.source: For evidence that implements this interface, the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.INormalizeForIsolatedStorage.Normalize%2A> method is called and comparisons are based on the normalized copy of the object returned by that method.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面，辨識項<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.INormalizeForIsolatedStorage.Normalize%2A>方法呼叫，而且比較依據該方法所傳回的物件正規化的副本。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.INormalizeForIsolatedStorage.Normalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a normalized copy of the object on which it is called.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回標準化的複本呼叫它的物件。

trans-unit.source: A normalized object that represents the instance on which this method was called.
trans-unit.target: 正規化的物件，表示呼叫這個方法的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This instance can be a string, stream, or any serializable object.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體可以是字串、 資料流，或是任何可序列化的物件。
